articles.author: Ben Golliver
articles.title: Tyrese Haliburton plays through injury, sparks Pacers to force Game 7 - The Washington Post
articles.description: Guard scores 14 points in 23 minutes as Indiana rolls at home, 108-91, to send the NBA Finals to a winner-take-all finale in Oklahoma City on Sunday night.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS For Indiana Pacers guard Tyrese Haliburton, one good leg was more than enough to deny the Oklahoma City Thunder its first chance to win the NBA championship.
Haliburton gutted through a… [+6917 chars]
